description:
It takes cleverness, strength and ruthlessness to lead the Skaven, and Clawlords have all three. Atop his mighty Gnaw-beast, the Skaven Clawlord can easily command his Clanrats from the rear of the army. In this step-by-step video, we'll show you how to paint this sinister leader up to Parade Ready standard, using advanced techniques worthy of a Verminlord! We'll be breaking down the whole process into sections, to make it easier to follow as well.

Base:
Grey Seer
Iron Warriors
Rakarth Flesh
Runelord Brass
Steel Legion Drab

Skeleton Horde

Wyldwood

Shade:

Carroburg Crimson
Kroak Green
S
title: How to Paint: Clawlord on Gnaw-beast | Advanced | Warhammer: Age of Sigmar

description:
